description: This Kotlin source file defines the MainActivity class, which serves as the main entry point for the mobile application after user authentication. It sets up navigation components including a NavHostFragment and a bottom navigation bar for accessing different sections such as Home, Search, Cart, Orders, and Profile.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the primary activity launched after user login, responsible for initializing navigation components and hosting a NavHostFragment along with a bottom navigation bar.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method that initializes the activity, sets up view binding, and configures navigation components including NavHostFragment and BottomNavigationView.
